addons.name: Firefox Hello Beta
addons.description: The latest beta test version of Firefox Hello
addons.fullDescription:
Firefox Hello is looking at addressing user needs via web sharing in Firefox.

This add-on is the latest version of the current in-development work that is released before the Firefox Hello is updated in Firefox.

Install it only if you want to help test the newest changes - if you want the stable version, you don't need to do anything - its already in Firefox.
